title: IBM Cloudant docs
introduction: The IBM Cloudant portfolio includes two complementary, document-oriented NoSQL database-as-a-service offerings on the IBM Cloud. In addition to the comprehensive information in the IBM Cloudant docs, links to additional sources of information are provided below.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloudant plans
section_recommended.description: Describes the plans you can use with IBM Cloudant and how IBM Cloudant calculates usage.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloudant security
section_recommended.description: Describes IAM, security compliance, and securing your connection and data.

section_recommended.title: Try IBM Cloudant for free
section_recommended.description: Describes the steps to get started with IBM Cloudant for free.

tiles.title: Fair share replicator
tiles.description: Add Fair share replicator that configures job priorities on a per replicator database.

tiles.title: Mango query operator
tiles.description: Introduce the Mango query operator, `$keyMapMatch`, that offers the ability to make queries on the keys of a map.
